name: Elsevier
0:
”Alexa, ask Elsevier for the latest news”
”Text that to me”
”Alexa, ask Elsevier for the app”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: el severe
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay up to date on the latest news from Elsevier. With this skill you can...

* Hear the latest Elsevier Facebook posts
* Have any post texted to your phone
* Get the links to the official name mobile app

A great way to keep informed using just your voice.
